prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Auditor of Public Accounts, Fees for collection of tax on free blacks: certificates from local courts, 1860-1861. Accession APA 702. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Local court clerks reported to their courts the number of free blacks in the locality and the amount of taxes collected. The reports were certified to the auditor of public accounts, who issued warrants for the clerks' fees.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged alphabetically by locality.
